tool_description: Creates web-based survey forms with customizable styling, responsive design, and multiple embedding options.

content_id.description: Content identifier from Survey Content Builder

form_style.description: Visual style theme: minimal, professional, colorful, dark

responsive_design.description: Whether to enable responsive mobile-friendly design

error_messages: Invalid content ID: Provided content_id does not exist or cannot be converted to web form.
Invalid form style: Use one of [minimal, professional, colorful, dark].
CSS validation error: custom_css contains invalid or potentially harmful styles.
Content incompatible: Survey content contains elements not supported in web forms.
usage: Provide content_id to generate a web form. Optionally specify form_style for visual theming and custom_css for additional styling. The tool creates responsive web forms with multiple embedding options.

form_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated web form

form_url.description: Direct URL to access the survey form

embed_code.description: HTML embed code for including form in websites
